shortdesc.ph: Allows a user to join a channel.

p.codeblock: - (int)joinChannelByToken:(NSString * _Nullable)token channelId:(NSString * _Nonnull)channelId info:(NSString * _Nullable)info uid:(NSUInteger)uid joinSuccess:(void(^ _Nullable) (NSString * _Nonnull channel, NSUInteger uid, NSInteger elapsed))joinSuccessBlock;
public abstract int JoinChannel(string token, string channelId, string info = "", uint uid = 0);
Future<void> joinChannel( String? token, String channelId, String? info, uid_t uid);

section.note: Once the user joins the channel, the user subscribes to the audio and video streams of all the other users in the channel by default, giving rise to usage and billing calculation. If you do not want to subscribe to a specified stream or all remote streams, call the mute methods accordingly.
